paragraph: We are calling for an end to all animal testing of cosmetic products golbally, and we're proud to partner with Human Society Internatuional's #BeCrueltyFree Campaign to advance that vision.

Our support of #BeCrueltyfree is another step in out long-term commitment to make animal testing obsolete. Our journey began over 40 years ago through ongoing research, investment and partnerships to develop and promote the use of alternatives to animal testing. These efforts have contributed to the greater good, enabling us and others to develop products that have not been tested on animals. Our contributors include:
